attributes.title: Trash
attributes.review: I opened the app to find a DISGUSTANG looking dried orange prune 🤢on my phone which 🤡has gave me nightmares and now O can’t close my eyes without imagining it 🤠and then the app 🤡told me some very weird things about supporting that thing which I find very offensive🤡 and I hate it after giving 💩me these nightmares👁👄👁

attributes.title: Truly awful
attributes.review: Opened the app and it showed me a picture of Donald Trump. That's it, it was enough for me to violently throw up all over my bed and my cat. So now i have to bath my cat and im not looking forward to it cause he will murder me in my sleep. So thanks trump, now im gonna be murded by my cat in my sleep all because of you.

attributes.title: hated it
attributes.review: when i first opened the app i saw this dusty crusty smelly orange / cheese puff of a man,I was astonished that apple allows this type of thing in the app store i think it would be bested if i was to be removed for everyone’s sake. Apple should not be promoting rapist and racist 🤧🤚 and i stand by that thank you for listening good day💅

attributes.title: If I could give it a 0 I would
attributes.review:
It is such disgusting app. No one should ever have to see the images that apply to this app. 🤢🤢I will never look at trump or his supporters the same again. They are all reckless Karens and I wish I could go back before I download this app.

attributes.title: Sis no- 👁👄👁
attributes.review: I got the app to see when we could go to our next Cheeto boy rally 😳 little did I know I was gonna see a naked Cheeto getting a spray tan 😠 my dog was right next to me and actually ended up getting a tumor from seeing the picture 😔 in conclusion don’t download keep your dogs safe 🥺

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!
attributes.review: This morning I woke up and ran downstairs in my pajamas and found the big orange man app on the AppStore 📞. I am a big lover of big, orange, man so I got it ammeedeatly. But then, big orange man appear on screen and say “I don’t like Jungkook, all my homies Stan Jimin”. This is outrageous! How can my favorite Cheeto boy not Stan Jungoooskk??  Now I Stan Kim katdashian West for first president lady. North west for vice 🤗.

attributes.title: Not What I Expected
attributes.review: I thought this was a Trump video game where you can hit the dummy but boy was I misinformed. This is just the worst app I’ve ever downloaded and that’s saying something because I once downloaded the Fox News app. Never again.  DONT USE THIS APP. ITS THE WORST. BLM. JUSTICE FOR _________. (It’s sad that there are too many names to fit)

attributes.title: i’m disgusted.
attributes.review: so basically, i got the app ready to support my president😜👍🏻 but THEN. i kept receiving notifications from the app telling me the government was gonna raid my house. they did. it’s happened to so many others too. so disappointed. will def be voting for trump in november tho! #bunker baby😻

attributes.title: Stinky
attributes.review: I couldn’t wait to download this app to support the Cheeto, but once I entered the app my phone began vibrating rapidly and screeching, I didn’t know what to do so turned it off and it took and hour to come back on again, absolutely terrible will never download again.

attributes.title: no ❤️
